briefTitle: Extracorporeal Shock Wave and a Tailored Exercise Program on Axillary Web Syndrome
officialTitle: The Combined Effect of Extracorporeal Shock Wave and a Tailored Exercise Program on Axillary Web Syndrome After Breast Cancer Surgery With Axillary Dissection: A Comparative, Controlled Clinical Trial.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* female
* between the ages of 40 and 65 years

Exclusion Criteria:

* metastases of any kind
* lymphedema,
* a traumatic injury to the targeted upper extremity
* a musculoskeletal disorder
* taking any anticoagulants
* had undergone bilateral breast cancer surgery
* experienced locoregional recurrence
* had vascular problems in the affected upper extremity
